text: José Lopez Ramirez (born December 17, 1975 in Málaga) is a 5-per-team football player from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a B1 type sportperson. He played 5-per-team football at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played Greece and, won 2-0. He played 5-per- team football at the 2012 Summer Paralympics. His team finished third after they played Argentina and, won 1-0. == References == Category:Spanish footballers Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Malaga Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Spanish 5-per-team footballers
title: José López Ramírez
